name: Ultramarines
description: The quintessential Space Marines, defenders of Ultramar.
notes: Loyal to the Emperor. Known for tactical precision.

name: Goffs
description: Brutal and cunning Orks, always looking for a good WAAAGH!

name: Black Legion
description: Heretic Astartes, sworn enemies of the Imperium.
notes: Chaos Undivided. Seek to plunge the galaxy into anarchy.

name: Hive Fleet Leviathan
description: Voracious xenos bio-forms, consuming all in their path.
notes: Driven by the insatiable hunger of the Hive Mind.

name: Ulthw√©
description: Ancient and enigmatic xenos, manipulating fate.
notes: Masters of psychic warfare and swift strikes.
